entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is a person who is frowning at the lighthearted behavior of others.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is a person who points out someone as 'that tall, good-looking one'.

entities.name: katie
entities.description: Katie is a person who describes the silent person as 'strong and silent'.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is a person who teases Oliver about being worried.

entities.name: oliver
entities.description: Oliver is a person who is worried and needs to be calmed down by Fred.

entities.name: hufflepuff
entities.description: Hufflepuff is the team that they are playing against.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The Snitch is an object that Harry caught in a previous match.

entities.name: diggory
entities.description: Diggory is a person who has put together a strong side for the team.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is the team that they are trying to outsmart.

relationships.description: Wood is frowning at the lighthearted behavior of others while thinking about their upcoming match against Hufflepuff.
Angelina points out someone as 'that tall, good-looking one' who is part of the Hufflepuff team.
Katie describes the silent person as 'strong and silent' who is part of the Hufflepuff team.
Fred teases Oliver about being worried.
Wood warns that Slytherin is trying to wrong-foot them.
Diggory has put together a strong side for the team against Hufflepuff.
Oliver is worried that Slytherin is trying to wrong-foot them.
Harry caught the Snitch in a previous match against Hufflepuff.
